main event: An observer reported seeing a dome-shaped object silently crossing his path while driving alone on a highway in Bolt, Montana on December 28, 1954.
interesting points: The object appeared to reflect sunlight and was descending rapidly on a level course,The object made a sharp turn and disappeared completely with no evidence of reappearing,The object was observed for several minutes,Descriptions of similar sightings in the area have been noted in other reports,The conclusion of the incident was classified as unidentified.
